lines.i: Medications administered in response to the emergency--usually by the EMS crew

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.72"
SHALL conform to Consol Medication Activity template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SBADM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:10445)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10448)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.03 negative action values If a substance is recorded as not given, it shall be recorded with a negationInd =True, and with an entryRelationship such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RSON" Has reason (CodeSystem: HL7ActRelationshipType 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002) SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True SHALL contain exactly one /Observation with code = "Assertion" and value drawn from 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.42 Medication omission reason

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10447)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.01

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode (CONF:10450), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationAdministrationRoute 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.43 DYNAMIC (CONF:10449)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.04
See appendix for mapping NEMSIS values to FDA values and for postcoordination of device information.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10451)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10458)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode (CONF:10460)/@code="RSON" Reason (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) (CONF:10459)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Medication Not Administered Reason Observation (CONF:10461)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Not Administered Reason Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.105)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable (CONF:10452)
This consumable SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct (CONF:10465)
This manufacturedProduct SHALL conform to Consol Medication Information template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23)
This manufacturedProduct SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedMaterial (CONF:10466)
This manufacturedMaterial SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.88 RxNorm) (CONF:10467)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.03 Note: all of RxNorm is legal in this field, but NEMSIS provides a selected list at http://www.nemsis.org/v3/resources.html

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10453)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Medication Response Observation (CONF:10468)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Response Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.106)

MAY contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:10454)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Medication Complication Observation (CONF:10472)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Complication Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.107)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10455)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Medication Prior Administration Observation (CONF:10477)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.02
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Prior Administration Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.108)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] performer (CONF:10456)
This participation is required if the medication is administered by the crew; i.e., if EMSMedicationPriorAdministrationObservation is FALSE.
This performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:10481)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:10484)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.09
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10482), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.46 DYNAMIC (CONF:10483)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.10

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10457)
This relationship is required if the medication is administered by the crew; i.e., if EMSMedicationPriorAdministrationObservation is FALSE.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] act (CONF:10485)
This act SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (CONF:10486)/@code="INFRM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:10487)
This act SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationAuthorizationType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.47 DYNAMIC (CONF:10488)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.11

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] approachSiteCode (CONF:11180)/@code="15562006" structure of respiratory region of nose (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:11181)
If route is "endotracheal," to be used to specify nasal approach for "nasotracheal tube"

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity (CONF:10446)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.05, 06 Note: rate values should be recorded in rateQuantity, not doseQuantity

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:11074)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DEV" (CONF:11182)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:11075)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="MANU" (CONF:11183)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingDevice (CONF:11076)
This playingDevice SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11184), which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:11185)
For NEMSIS route codes that imply devices: @ value = "39849001" @codeSystem = "2.16.840.1.113883.6.5" @displayName="nasal oxygen cannula" @ value = "427591007" @codeSystem = "2.16.840.1.113883.6.5" @displayName="nonrebreather oxygen mask" @ value = "425926003" @codeSystem = "2.16.840.1.113883.6.5" @displayName="partial rebreather oxygen mask" @ value = "428285009" @codeSystem = "2.16.840.1.113883.6.5" @displayName="Venturi mask"

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] rateQuantity (CONF:7517)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.05, 06 Note: rate values should be recorded in rateQuantity, not doseQuantity
SHALL conform to Consol Medication Activity template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SBADM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:10445)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MoodCodeEvnInt 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 STATIC 2011-04-03 (CONF:7497)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10448)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.03 negative action values If a substance is recorded as not given, it shall be recorded with a negationInd =True, and with an entryRelationship such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RSON" Has reason (CodeSystem: HL7ActRelationshipType 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002) SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True SHALL contain exactly one /Observation with code = "Assertion" and value drawn from 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.42 Medication omission reason
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7500)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:7506)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:7501)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:7507)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10447)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.01

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (CONF:7555)
In "INT" (intent) mood, the repeatNumber defines the number of allowed administrations. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" means that the substance can be administered up to 3 times In "EVN" (event) mood, the repeatNumber is the number of occurrences. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" in a substance administration event means that the current administration is the 3rd in a series

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode (CONF:10450), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationAdministrationRoute 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.43 DYNAMIC (CONF:10449)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.04
See appendix for mapping NEMSIS values to FDA values and for postcoordination of device information.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] approachSiteCode (CONF:11180)/@code="15562006" structure of respiratory region of nose (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:11181)
If route is "endotracheal," to be used to specify nasal approach for "nasotracheal tube"

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity (CONF:10446)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.05, 06 Note: rate values should be recorded in rateQuantity, not doseQuantity

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] rateQuantity (CONF:7517)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.05, 06 Note: rate values should be recorded in rateQuantity, not doseQuantity
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] maxDoseQuantity (CONF:7518)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] administrationUnitCode, which MAY be selected from ValueSet Medication Product Form Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.11 STATIC 1 (CONF:7519)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:7539, CONF:7540, CONF:16088)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Contains exactly one [1..1] Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:7543, CONF:7547, CONF:16089)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Supply Order (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:7552, CONF:7544, CONF:16091)
Contains @typeCode="CAUS" CAUS
Contains exactly one [1..1] Reaction Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:7536, CONF:7537, CONF:16087)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Contains exactly one [1..1] Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:7549, CONF:7553, CONF:16090)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Dispense (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.18)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition (CONF:7546, CONF:16092)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Precondition For Substance Administration (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.25)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:7523, CONF:7524, CONF:16086)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Drug Vehicle (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.24)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable (CONF:7520)
This consumable SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct, where its type is Medication Information (CONF:16085)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10451)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10458)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode (CONF:10460)/@code="RSON" Reason (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) (CONF:10459)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Medication Not Administered Reason Observation (CONF:10461)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Not Administered Reason Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.105)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable (CONF:10452)
This consumable SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct (CONF:10465)
This manufacturedProduct SHALL conform to Consol Medication Information template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23)
This manufacturedProduct SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedMaterial (CONF:10466)
This manufacturedMaterial SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.88 RxNorm) (CONF:10467)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.03 Note: all of RxNorm is legal in this field, but NEMSIS provides a selected list at http://www.nemsis.org/v3/resources.html

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10453)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Medication Response Observation (CONF:10468)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Response Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.106)

MAY contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:10454)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Medication Complication Observation (CONF:10472)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Complication Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.107)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10455)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Medication Prior Administration Observation (CONF:10477)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.02
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Prior Administration Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.108)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] performer (CONF:10456)
This participation is required if the medication is administered by the crew; i.e., if EMSMedicationPriorAdministrationObservation is FALSE.
This performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:10481)
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:10484)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.09
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10482), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.46 DYNAMIC (CONF:10483)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.10

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10457)
This relationship is required if the medication is administered by the crew; i.e., if EMSMedicationPriorAdministrationObservation is FALSE.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] act (CONF:10485)
This act SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (CONF:10486)/@code="INFRM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:10487)
This act SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationAuthorizationType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.47 DYNAMIC (CONF:10488)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedications.11

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant (CONF:11074)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="DEV" (CONF:11182)
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole (CONF:11075)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="MANU" (CONF:11183)
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingDevice (CONF:11076)
This playingDevice SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:11184), which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:11185)
For NEMSIS route codes that imply devices: @ value = "39849001" @codeSystem = "2.16.840.1.113883.6.5" @displayName="nasal oxygen cannula" @ value = "427591007" @codeSystem = "2.16.840.1.113883.6.5" @displayName="nonrebreather oxygen mask" @ value = "425926003" @codeSystem = "2.16.840.1.113883.6.5" @displayName="partial rebreather oxygen mask" @ value = "428285009" @codeSystem = "2.16.840.1.113883.6.5" @displayName="Venturi mask"
Medication Activity SHOULD include doseQuantity OR rateQuantity (CONF:7529)
text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15977)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15978)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15979)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type = "IVL_TS" (CONF:7508, CONF:9104)
effectiveTime with @xsi:type="IVL_TS" SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low
effectiveTime with @xsi:type="IVL_TS" SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] high
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type = "PIVL_TS" or "EIVL_TS" (CONF:7513, CONF:9105)
effectiveTime with @xsi:type = "PIVL_TS" or "EIVL_TS" SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @operator="A" (CONF:9106)
doseQuantity, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @unit, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet UCUM Units of Measure (case sensitive) 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12839 DYNAMIC (CONF:7526)
participant with target entry Drug Vehicle SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CSM" (CodeSystem: HL7ParticipationType 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90) (CONF:7524)
entryRelationship with target entry Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:7542)
Precondition for Substance Administration SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRCN" (CodeSystem: HL7ActRelationshipType 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002) (CONF:7550)
rateQuantity, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @unit, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet UnitsOfMeasureCaseSensitive 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12839 DYNAMIC (CONF:7525)
